text:
@SecPompeo Seize the time to slander China, when...

1. Demonstrations broke out across the US.
2. COVID-19 super spread again
3. Deep tearing of economy and society
4. Partisan Competition
5. When American hooliganism fails to achieve its goals
6. Any other adverse circumstances in the US
